title: Insect collecting
creator_credit: Pat Dowling and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: How an insect collection can be established. Representative terrestial and aquatic insects are studied in extreme close-up photography, collecting methods shown include netting, beating host plants, night collecting, investigating dead trees, using the Beriese funnel to procure microscopic speciments, and aquatic methods.
